definitions: To apply a liquid in a fine mist or droplets.
To cover something with a spray.
To discharge a liquid from a spray can or similar device.
To scatter or direct a stream of liquid or small particles over an area.
examples: The gardener sprayed the roses with insecticide.
Water sprayed from the broken pipe.
He sprayed paint onto the canvas.
The car sprayed gravel as it turned the corner.
